job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtas a lead role the person will be an integral part of core group and will be reporting into director engineering to be successful in this role you should have exceptional leadership communication and project management skills with multiple years of management experience and belief in developing the skills and talents of others the role includes responsibility for validating making high level design choices for the big data processing cloud architecture frameworks protocols apis and cloud servicesltpgtltpgtthe individual should have expertise in the definition design implementation development of big data architecture in the cloud technologies like awsazuregoogle cloud platform etcltpgt
